sourcesContent:
<template>
    <canvas id="canvas" width="128" height="32" class="dmd-canvas-main">{</canvas>
</template>

<script>
//import  { fabric }  from 'fabric';

export default {
  name: 'MainDmd',
  props: {
    plane0Data: Uint8Array,
    plane1Data: Uint8Array,
    shouldBlend: Boolean
  },
  methods: {
    drawImage() {
        //if(this.shouldBlend) {
        //    this.drawBlendedImage(this.plane0Data,this.plane1Data);
       // } else {
            console.log(this.plane0Data);
            this.draw1bitImage(this.plane0Data);
        //}
    },
    //drawBlendedImage(plane0Data,plane1Data) {

    //},
    draw1bitImage(plane0Data) {
        const canvas = document.querySelector("#canvas");
        let ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");
        let imageData = ctx.createImageData(128,32);
        let counter = 0;
        for(let i=0; i<imageData.data.length; i += 4) {
            let color = this.bitToRGBRows(plane0Data,counter);
            //if(plane1Data != null) {
            //    color = bitToRGBRowsBlended(plane0Data,plane1Data,counter);
            //}
            imageData.data[i] = color*187 +33;
            imageData.data[i+1] = color*100 +33;
            imageData.data[i+2] = 33;//color;
            imageData.data[i+3] = 255;
            counter++;
        }
        console.log(plane0Data);
        ctx.putImageData(imageData,0,0);
    },
    bitToRGBRows(planeData,index) {
        const width = 128;
        const col = index % width;
        const byte = Math.floor(index/8);
        const bitPos = (col % 8);
        const bit =  ( planeData[byte] & 0xFF ) >>(bitPos) & 1;
        return bit;
    },
    bitToRGBRowsBlended(plane0Data,plane1Data,index) {
        const width = 128;
        const col = index % width;
        const byte = Math.floor(index/8);
        const bitPos = (col % 8);
        const plane0Bit =  ( plane0Data[byte] & 0xFF ) >>(bitPos) & 1;
        const plane1Bit =  ( plane1Data[byte] & 0xFF ) >>(bitPos) & 1;
        let colorVal = plane0Bit * 0.67 + plane1Bit * 0.33;
        return colorVal;
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.drawImage();
  }
}

</script>

<style scoped>

.dmd-canvas-main {
    margin-top: 100px;
}

</style>
